EmailTemplate.name: YETI Wheels Request
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in YETI! At this time we do not have a cooler incorporating a permanent wheel system, nor do we sell a wheeled accessory option. However, please check out our buddies over at www.ramblerwheels.com to turn your YETI into your best beach buddy, parking lot pal, and all terrain good time on wheels.
Rambler Wheels Video
YETI owners have also had great success with custom carts and dollies. Below are a few additional options to consider.
Angler's Fish-N-Mate (www.fishnmate.com)
Model that Fit YETI Roadies that Fit YETI Tundras
Fish-n-Mate (cart) YR20 YT 35 ,45, 50, 65, 75
Fish-n-Mate Jr (cart) YR20 YT 35, 45
Surf-n-Mate (hitch mount) YR20 YT 45, 50, 65, 75, 105
Surf-n-Mate Jr (hitch mount) YR20 YT 35, 45, 50
Fishing Carts (www.fishingcarts.com)
Model that Fit YETI Roadies that Fit YETI Tundras
Reels on Wheels Sr (cart) YR20 YT 35, 45, 50, 65, 75
Reels on Wheels Jr (cart) YR20 YT 35, 45
Beach Buddy (cart) YR20 YT 35, 45
Hitch Mount 12 Rod Rack YR20 YT 35, 45, 50, 65, 75
Hitch Mount 8 Rod Rack YR20 YT 35, 45, 50
Please give us a call at 512.394.9384 if you have any additional questions or concerns.
Regards
{!User.CommunityNickname} The YETI Outfitters 512.394.9384 customerservice@yeticoolers.com yeticoolers.com
